duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform regular inspections of machinery and equipment to identify and address any maintenance needs.
Carry out regularly scheduled preventative maintenance on machinery and equipment to ensure optimal functionality.
Diagnose and troubleshoot problems with machinery or equipment through root cause analysis and diagnostic tests.
Disassemble, repair, and replace broken or malfunctioning parts of machinery or equipment.
Test and run machinery to ensure proper functioning after repairs or maintenance tasks.
Assist in the installation of new manufacturing equipment and calibrate existing equipment as per specifications.
Conduct routine inspection and testing of equipment and machinery to minimize disruption of processes.
Respond to alerts and carry out corrective procedures and repairs in line with maintenance protocols.
Maintain documentation of routine checks, repairs, and downtime within the manufacturing system.
Perform general maintenance work on buildings and maintain a clean and organized work area.

skills.skill: Basic Machining on Mill and Lathe

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma/GED (Trade or vocational school graduation a plus)
